page.title: 10HOME LIFE: GUINEA PIGS
page.content: { A{GUINEA PIG}IS{SMALL}AND{FURRY}WITH NO{TAIL.}THEY COME IN ALL TYPES AND COLOURS. IN MY FAMILY WE HAVE 3{GUINEA {PIGS,}ONE ALL WHITE WITH PINK EYES, HE IS A{HIMALAYAN BREED,}THE SECOND ONE IS AN{ABYSSINIAN, HE IS GREY AND BROWN WITH{ROSETTES}OF{FUR}ALL OVER.THE THIRD ONE IS CREAM AND BROWN WITH QUITE LONG HAIR AND DARK EYES. {GUINEA PIGS}ARE VEGETARIANS, THIS MEANS THEY DON'T EAT MEAT.THEY LIKE MOST GREEN FOOD SUCH AS {:GRASS,CABBAGE, LETTUCE.}DRIED FOOD AND{CARROTS}SHOULD BE GIVEN EVERY DAY. A LARGE AIRY BOX, WITH HAY IS NEEDED FOR THE ANIMAL TO SLEEP IN. IT SHOULD BE KEPT{CLEAN.
